title: Best-ever gooey, sticky cinnamon rolls
ingredients: ['Filling', '300g caster sugar', '3 tablespoons ground cinnamon', '225g pecan halves (optional)', 'Dough', '20g dried active baking yeast', '225ml warm water (45 degrees C)', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '250ml warm milk (45 degrees C)', '125g caster sugar', '150g butter, melted', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 eggs', '1kg plain flour, divided', '225g butter, melted, divided', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', 'Icing', '500g icing sugar', '150g butter, melted', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon maple-flavoured extract (optional)']
